Montgomery County, TX Population by Year

In 2023, the population of Montgomery County was 711,354, a 4.68% increase year-by-year from 2022. Previously, in 2022, Montgomery County's population was 679,554, an increase of 4.43% compared to a population of 650,755 in 2021.

By Neilsberg Research

Updated Aug 1, 2024

Montgomery County, TX population between 2000 and 2023

Over the last 20 plus years, between 2000 and 2023, population of Montgomery County increased by 414,049. In this period, the peak population was 711,354 in the year 2023. The numbers suggest that the population has not reached its peak yet and is showing a trend of further growth.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Montgomery County, TX population from 2000 to 2023

From 2000 to 2010, Montgomery County's population increased by 161,918 (54.46%), according to Census Bureau's Population Estimates Program. For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 9.63%.

From 2010 to 2020, Montgomery County's population increased by 166,068 (36.16%), according to Census Bureau's Population Estimates Program. For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 7.18% .

After the COVID19 pandemic and, between the year 2020 and 2023, Montgomery County's population increased by 86,063 (13.76%).For the same period, the rate of growth for the United States was 1.02%.

FIGURE 1

Montgomery County's population from 2000 to 2023.

The estimated population at the end of 2023 was 711,354.

Between the year 2000 and 2023, Montgomery County's population peaked in year 2023 at 711,354.

Between the year 2000 and 2023, Montgomery County's population was lowest in year 2000 at 297,305.

Montgomery County, TX annual population growth rate

Between the years 2000 and 2023, i.e. 23 annual cycles, the population of Montgomery County grew year by year for 23 years and declined for 0 years.

From 2000 to 2023, Montgomery County had an average annual population growth rate of 6.06% per year. Overall the population grew 139.27% between 2000 and 2023.

FIGURE 2

Montgomery County annual population growth rate

The average annual growth rate from 2000 to 2023 was 6.06% per year.

From 2022 to 2023 Montgomery County population grew the most, with an increase of 31,800 people (a 4.68% year-on-year increase)..

Between the years2000 and 2023, Montgomery County did not experience a population decline during any annual cycle.

Things to know

Is Montgomery County, TX population increasing or decreasing?

According to the latest data from U.S. Census Bureau's population estimates, Montgomery County's population increased by 60,599 between 2021 and 2023. The increase was 28,799 (increased) between 2021 and 2022; and increase of 31,800 (4.68%) between 2022 and 2023.

How has the population of Montgomery County, TX changed in the last 10 years?

Between 2013 and 2023, population of Montgomery County increased by 212,866 (42.70%). The population was highest at 711,354 in the year 2023 and lowest at 517,262 in the year 2014. Overall the average growth rate witnessed for the last 10 years was 3.62%.

Last updated July 30, 2024

About this dataset

Context

The dataset tabulates the Montgomery County population over the last 20 plus years. It lists the population for each year, along with the year on year change in population, as well as the change in percentage terms for each year. The dataset can be utilized to understand the population change of Montgomery County across the last two decades. For example, using this dataset, we can identify if the population is declining or increasing. If there is a change, when the population peaked, or if it is still growing and has not reached its peak. We can also compare the trend with the overall trend of United States population over the same period of time.

Key observations

In 2023, the population of Montgomery County was 711,354, a 4.68% increase year-by-year from 2022. Previously, in 2022, Montgomery County population was 679,554, an increase of 4.43% compared to a population of 650,755 in 2021. Over the last 20 plus years, between 2000 and 2023, population of Montgomery County increased by 414,049. In this period, the peak population was 711,354 in the year 2023. The numbers suggest that the population has not reached its peak yet and is showing a trend of further growth. Source: U.S. Census Bureau Population Estimates Program (PEP).

Content

When available, the data consists of estimates from the U.S. Census Bureau Population Estimates Program (PEP).

Data Coverage:

From 2000 to 2023

Variables / Data Columns

Year: This column displays the data year (Measured annually and for years 2000 to 2023)

Population: The population for the specific year for the Montgomery County is shown in this column.

Year on Year Change: This column displays the change in Montgomery County population for each year compared to the previous year.

Change in Percent: This column displays the year on year change as a percentage. Please note that the sum of all percentages may not equal one due to rounding of values.

Good to know

Margin of Error

Data in the dataset are based on the estimates and are subject to sampling variability and thus a margin of error. Neilsberg Research recommends using caution when presening these estimates in your research.

Custom data

If you do need custom data for any of your research project, report or presentation, you can contact our research staff at research@neilsberg.com for a feasibility of a custom tabulation on a fee-for-service basis.
